title: [Test]: Add E2E test of the BuildCheck with applied severity
body:
### Issue Description

After the `Severity` updates were merged https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10330 , the e2e tests of BuildCheck were skipped in CI. 
Let's add automated E2E test of severity set to all possible values after the PR: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10307 enabling tests back is merged.  

### Goal
To automate testing around editorconfig in e2e scenarios. 
Currently if the severity was not applied correctly for some reason in e2e there is no verification test for that
